title: Screen Time Regulation for Neurodivergent Minds
description: A digital wellness routine designed for ADHD and autistic individuals. Uses evidence-based strategies to prevent doom scrolling, reduce screen time overwhelm, and build healthy tech habits that support rather than drain neurodivergent brains.

setupSteps.question: What's your biggest digital challenge? (doom scrolling, social media overuse, work screen time, gaming, or all of the above)
What time of day do you want to start reducing screen time? (e.g., evening wind-down, work breaks, or specific hours)
What's one offline activity you enjoy? (reading, walking, crafting, music, etc.)
How many minutes do you want to reduce your daily screen time by? (Start small - 15-30 minutes is perfect!)
What helps you feel grounded when you're overwhelmed? (breathing, movement, sensory tool, specific phrase)
